<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Dust](/Equipment.aspx?ID=215)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use an action with the move trait

**Requirement** You are legendary in Stealth
</row>

</column>

---

This small vial is filled with a grayish-green dust rendered from dried ectoplasm. When you activate the dust, it casts a 4th-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell on you. This comes into effect before you move during the triggering action.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghost Dust
